caption.title: Vimes computing time, for all simulation scenarios, under the "control" reconstruction scenario (see S1 Text, S1 Table and S2 Table for a definition of the simulation and reconstruction scenarios).
caption.p: The computing time encompasses the time required to 1) compute the pairwise distances in time, geographical space, and genetic space, 2) calculate the cutoffs associated with the quantile chosen (here 95%) and the assumed reporting rate (here 20%), and 3) construct, prune, and merge the graphs to define clusters of cases linked by local transmission. Note the computing time only measures the time required to perform the reconstruction, not the simulation. The dashed line represents y = 2.33 + 1.37 * 10 âˆ’5 x 2.2.
